author: Game Predictions
title: MLB League Championship Playoff and World Series Chances: Cubs over Blue Jays
text:
MLB League Championship Playoff and World Series Chances: Cubs over Blue Jays PredictionMachine 1 day ago Game Predictions Heading into the League Championship Series, the Chicago Cubs (wait, what?... yes, the Chicago Cubs) are the most likely World Series Champion winning it all 31.7% of the time.
AdChoices The Toronto Blue Jays are the most likely team to make the World Series from the American League.
The ALCS is 62% likely to go at least six games, while the NLCS is 64% likely to go at least six games. Overall, the National League is 59% likely to win the World Series.
MLB World Series Odds (based on 2015 MLB Playoffs played 50,000 times):
Region Seed Team World Series Champ. AL 1 KC 43.0% 15.4% AL 2 Tor 57.0% 25.8% Region Seed Team World Series Champ.
